title: If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
OB: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance without deploying any webapps on it, and accessing a URL, it returns an HTTP response with code 200 OK. However, the response does not contain any content.
EB: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance without deploying any webapps on it, and accessing a URL, it should return an HTTP response with code 404 Not Found, indicating that the requested resource could not be found.
SR:
1. Download http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip.
2. Extract the zip file to a directory.
3. Start a Tomcat 7 instance without deploying any webapps on it.
4. Access a URL.
5. Verify that the HTTP response code is 404 Not Found.
